headline: Assurant Board of Directors Declares Quarterly Dividend of $0.80 per Common Share
summary: ATLANTA, August 14, 2025--Assurant, Inc. (NYSE: AIZ), a premier global protection company that safeguards and services connected devices, homes and automobiles in partnership with the world’s leading brands, announced today that its Board of Directors declared a quarterly dividend of $0.80 per share of common stock. The dividend will be payable on September 29, 2025 to stockholders of record as of the close of business on September 2, 2025.

headline: Why This 1 Growth Stock Could Be a Great Addition to Your Portfolio
summary: The Zacks Style Scores offers investors a way to easily find top-rated stocks based on their investing style. Here's why you should take advantage.
